title: Can we eat all the Organs of halal slaughtered animals like Testicles, Udder etc? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Zhi Shan says is it permissible to eat organs of halal slaughtered animals some people say it is disliked makrooh to eat testicles and other parts even if they eat the women must not eat testicles and men must not eat others or something like that is that true the answer is no this is totally false and baseless and has no origin in Islam for it maybe it's cultural may be is taken from other religions Islam says if you slaughter a halal animal anything in that animal is halal for you to consume and to eat you have no problem in that none whatsoever
